summary: All four requirements (REQ-21 through REQ-24) appear to be implemented in the diff. REQ-21 is addressed in Sidebar.tsx with delete buttons for custom categories only. REQ-22 is addressed with the KEYWORD_EMOJI_MAP and getSuggestedEmoji function in Sidebar.tsx. REQ-23 is addressed in Login.tsx with the same logo path as DashboardHeader. REQ-24 is addressed in Signup.tsx with real-time password hint and popup blocking. One concern: auth.ts enforcement for REQ-24 is not directly visible in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enforce password minimum 6 characters rule in frontend/src/utils/auth.ts signup validation logic â€” if password is fewer than 6 characters, block signup and show a custom popup with 'Password must be at least 6 characters.'
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include any changes to frontend/src/utils/auth.ts. The file summary for auth.ts does not mention a minimum password length check being added. The enforcement in Signup.tsx is client-side only (checks before calling signup()), but the requirement explicitly states the rule must also be enforced inside auth.ts.

hallucinated_features.description: A logo was also added to the Signup page in addition to the Login page
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-23 only requested the logo be added to the Login page. The diff shows Signup.tsx also received the same logo image, which was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Fallback SVG icon added to Login page when logo image fails to load
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-23 does not request any fallback mechanism for the logo. A hidden fallback SVG div was added to Login.tsx which was not part of any requirement.
